overview: Prior to founding Cloud Commerce, I served in multiple roles at Brown Shoe Company (NYSE: BWS) including Vice President of Information Systems. In this position, I was responsible for managing a major portion of the application portfolios that supported corporate governance and administration systems, worldwide sourcing and product development, domestic wholesale, corporate EDI, customer support, and e-commerce business units, including Shoes.com (www.shoes.com). I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Information Systems from Missouri State University.
